projectDetails: Built several web applications including an e-commerce platform using MERN stack and a task management app with real-time features using Socket.io
customQuestions: Tell me about your experience with React and state management

questions.title: Two Sum
questions.prompt: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.
